getLookupUri(long, java.lang.String).Description: Build a @B_android#provider#ContactsContract#Contacts#CONTENT_LOOKUP_URI_E@ lookup @B_android#net#Uri_E@ using the given @B_android#provider#BaseColumns#_ID_E@ and @B_android#provider#ContactsContract#ContactsColumns#LOOKUP_KEY_E@. Parameters: long: the person who was contacted
markAsContacted(android.content.ContentR.Description: Contacts affinity information is no longer supported as of Android version @B_android#os#Build#VERSION_CODES#Q_E@. This method is no-op. Mark a contact as having been contacted. Updates two fields: @B_android#provider#ContactsContract#ContactOptionsColumns#TIMES_CONTACTED_E@ and @B_android#provider#ContactsContract#ContactOptionsColumns#LAST_TIME_CONTACTED_E@. The TIMES_CONTACTED field is incremented by 1 and the LAST_TIME_CONTACTED field is populated with the current system time.
markAsContacted(android.content.ContentR.history: Added in API level 5 Deprecated in API level 16
markAsContacted(android.content.ContentR.FullName: public static void markAsContacted (ContentResolver resolver, long contactId)

lookupContact(android.content.ContentRes.Description: Computes a content URI (see @B_android#provider#ContactsContract#Contacts#CONTENT_URI_E@) given a lookup URI. Returns null if the contact cannot be found.
lookupContact(android.content.ContentRes.FullName: public static Uri lookupContact (ContentResolver resolver, Uri lookupUri)

isEnterpriseContactId(long).Description: Return TRUE if a contact ID is from the contacts provider on the enterprise profile. @B_android#provider#ContactsContract#PhoneLookup#ENTERPRISE_CONTENT_FILTER_URI_E@ may return such a contact.

Returns: an InputStream of the photo, or null if no photo is present
Parameters: ContentResolver: The content resolver to use for querying

Uri: the contact whose photo should be used. This can be used with either a @B_android#provider#ContactsContract#Contacts#CONTENT_URI_E@ or a @B_android#provider#ContactsContract#Contacts#CONTENT_LOOKUP_URI_E@ URI.
boolean: If this is true and the contact has a higher resolution photo available, it is returned. If false, this function always tries to get the thumbnail

ClassDesc: Constants for the contacts table, which contains a record per aggregate of raw contacts representing the same person.
